item.title: [mh2] Bloodbraid Marauder
item.description:
Creature — Human Beserker

Bloodbraid Marauder can't block.

Delirium — This spell has cascade as long as there are four or more card types amont cards in your graveyard. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)

item.description:

Kicker {1} (You may pay an additional {1} as you cast this spell.)

Tide Shaper gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls an Island.
